title: BetonQuest目标应用
author: 1140v
txt_content:
a2: mobkill ENDERMITE 3 name:§a** conditions:a2开始 events:good notify
这是目标原文，但是这个目标无法在击杀mm怪§a**的时候触发效果，求解。

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
你可能需要装一个这个扩展
https://github.com/BerndiVader/MythicMobsQuestsModule

replies.author: 1140v
replies.txt_content:
wjwrh 发表于 2020-4-27 09:44

https://github.com/BerndiVader/MythicMobsQuestsModule

replies.author: Foxm
replies.txt_content: 击杀mm怪要用mmobkill目标mmobkill 怪物ID amount:2 events:reward复制代码
